* Devops Summary
DevOps System Admininstrator bringing superior design, deployment, debugging capabilities, innovative problem solving skills and dedication to quality *** Skills: **** Languages: in general order of familiarity: • SQL Server, MS Access (VBA), VB, VBScript, Ruby, Javascript, Perl, Python, C/C++, C#, .NET, HTML, CSS, XML, PHP, MySQL, Unix/Linux, Cygwin, Power Shell, ASP, Lisp, Java **** Software: • Expertise in Windows, Linux, Chef, Puppet, Remote Powershell, Chocolatey, Git, SQL Server Management Studio, SSIS, DTS, Virtualization, Visual Studio, Eclipse, Emacs, Vim, Wordpress and Joomla *** Accomplishments ****Product Technical Support for a Global Company that develops Marketing Automation/Variable Data Printing/Flexible web-to-print platforms **** ItemizedFunctions:
Interface with product engineering to develop new features and bug fixes based on customer needs
Resolve, debug and document customer issues as related to the Pageflex technology stack (see below)
Developed Custom Storefront Deployment (automation) (Using Pageflex to document and control Pageflex)
Re-build and emulate customer platforms using virtualization to resolve customer issues
Resolve SMTP, network and firewall issues as related to Pageflex operations **** ItemizedTechnology Stack:
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows IIS Web Server, Pageflex Server
SQL Server (backups, restores, queries) SQL Server 2005, 2008, 2012 and 2014 (clustered)
SQL Server SSIS/DTS
VMWare ESXi (vCenter Server and vSphere Client)
Graphics and Font technology, Adobe Indesign on MAC as related to Pageflex Support
Javascript, Vbscript and XML command packet API
Pageflex Studio, Pageflex Storefront, ASP.Net platform, Salesforce, Lotus Notes, Slack, Sharepoint **** Currently in Progress (On-going) Multiple Projects for RGNterprises, TSSG, Automated Income Master Mind and Flat Penny Bar and Grill involving multiple technologies in full stack web development, Big Data Analytics, Software QA Automation, DevOps, Networking and Internet Marketing. Please see https://linkedin/in/raynieva for more detailed information **** Working for the largest Foodservice GPO in the nation
